title: The Rose: A Tale of Fantasy
description: Hollymae is a young girl who believes she'll eventually rule the City of Dar. But when her brother is born late in life, she has doubts. She hates her brother more and more each day as his hair color begins to change. Still, being the oldest, Hollymae holds on to her dream.On her father's death bed she learns her brother will be the new King, not her, because he possesses golden hair like their father. Although not golden, Hollymae has blond hair. She doesn't want to upset her father, but not understanding, she questions him. Her father talks to her about the gift only she has. A special gift that gives her another purpose in life, and he tells her she can't rule Dar because she is to become Queen of the Beasts. Hollymae doesn't know the full strength of her powers, or the many powers that hasn't even surfaced yet, but with her faithful companions beside her, she begins her quest.Visit the website for all my books: memoir series, true crime, crime fiction series.http://sj2448.wix.com/suejulsen
author: Sue Julsen
